actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 18 of title 22, United States Code, to permit domestic dissemination of records of the United States International Communication Agency that have been accessioned into the Archives of the United States.

summary.text: Provides that information published outside the United States by the International Communications Agency shall not be subject to the prohibition against dissemination of such information within the United States. Permits such dissemination after the information has been accessioned into the National Archives.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 18 of title 22, United States Code, to permit domestic dissemination of records of the United States International Communication Agency that have been accessioned into the Archives of the United States.
